channel.title: How do i make my self owner on my 508
channel.description: how do i make my self owner on my 508

item.title: How do i make my self owner on my 508
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

lmfao you are all incorrect except for kilplayer saying the correct thing up there but there is no owner
there is no owner is 508s only mod and admin go to login.java and search } if (p.username.equals("your name")) { p.rights = 2;

you will see something like that where it says your name change it to your name p.rights = 2 is admin p.rights = 1 is mod once your done save compile and your admin cuz 508s dont have owner

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self owner on my 508

item.title: How do i make my self owner on my 508
item.dc:creator: @AustinPownz AustinPownz
item.description:
@AustinPownz wrote:

Got To Your Name In Character File Find It and set rights to 5 or 4 i think

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my self owner on my 508
item.dc:creator: @kilplayer kilplayer
item.description:
@kilplayer wrote:

kidler is wrong there is no such thing as client.java in a 508
you have togo to the map where u have your server files goto /src/palidino76/rs2/io/login.java
and search there for something like:

if (p.username.equals("YOURNAME")) { p.rights = 2; }

and change the name to what you want
hope this helped you

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self owner on my 508

item.title: How do i make my self owner on my 508

item.description:
@nemata wrote:

But people do like credits, so make sure you give some credits, like “Source made by Chuck Norris, Edited by Mr. T” something like that.

search the original owner’s name in client.java and you should find something like owner or admin w/e then just delete and add ur own
